title: England vs India cricket LIVE: Fourth Test, day one, Old Trafford
description: England face India in the fourth Test at Old Trafford - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
content:
Post
Matthew Henry
BBC Sport journalist at Old Trafford
Jofra Archer dismissed Yashasvi Jaiswal cheaply in both innings at Lord's, setting today up as an intriguing tussle between the pair.

title: Cornwall surgeon accused of fraud over amputation of his own legs
description: Neil Hopper, 49, from Truro appears in court accused of lying to insurers about how he lost his legs
content:
A surgeon from Cornwall who carried out hundreds of amputations is appearing in court accused of lying over how he lost his own legs and encouraging another man to remove the body parts of others.
Vascular surgeon Neil Hopper, 49, from Truro, was cha... [2084 chars]

title: Investigating illegal worker clampdown and Ukraine protest misinformation
description: Latest updates from the BBC's specialists in fact-checking, verifying video and tackling disinformation.
content:
Is the government on course to recruit 13,000 neighbourhood police officers?

title: City trader Tom Hayes’s conviction for Libor rigging is overturned
description: Supreme court also quashes conviction of banker Carlo Palombo over incorrect directions given to jury
content:
Tom Hayes, the first banker jailed over the Libor interest rate-rigging scandal in 2015, has cleared his name after the UK’s supreme court overturned a decade-old conviction against the former UBS and Citigroup trader.
A panel of five justices, led b... [5157 chars]

title: Apple and Google have 'effective duopoly' in UK says regulator
description: The tech giants both expressed concern at the rulings, but said they will co-operate with investigations.
content:
Apple and Google may be required to change the way they operate some of their mobile services in the UK, according to proposed decisions by the UK's competition regulator.
The Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) is investigating the tech giants o... [367 chars]
